TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CLDeviceOrientation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values represent the device's physical orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLDeviceOrientation FaceDown = unsigned int32(6)

Docs.summary: The device is parallel to the ground and the face is pointing towards the ground.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLDeviceOrientation FaceUp = unsigned int32(5)

Docs.summary: The device is parallel to the ground and the face is pointing towards the sky.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLDeviceOrientation LandscapeLeft = unsigned int32(3)

Docs.summary: The device is in an upright position, with the home button to the right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLDeviceOrientation LandscapeRight = unsigned int32(4)

Docs.summary: The device is in an upright position, with the home button to the left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLDeviceOrientation Portrait = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: The device is in an upright position, with the home button towards the ground.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLDeviceOrientation PortraitUpsideDown = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: The device is in an upright position, with the home button towards the sky.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLDeviceOrientation Unknown = unsigned int32(0)
